mapper.select: select s.id as s_id,s.name as s_name,s.type as s_type,s.info as s_info,s.voteNumber as s_vote_number,s.startTime as s_start_time,s.endTime as s_end_time,s.createTime as s_create_time, si.id as si_id,si.subjectId as si_subject_id,si.title as si_title,si.voteNumber as si_vote_number,si.createTime as si_create_time from Subject s,Subject_Item si where name like #{name} and s.id = si.subjectId LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
select * from Subject where name like #{name} ORDER BY voteNumber desc LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from Subject where name like #{name}
mapper.update: update Subject set name = #{name},type = #{type},info = #{info},startTime = #{startTime},endTime = #{endTime} where id = #{id}
delete from Subject where id in ${value}
update Subject set voteNumber = voteNumber + 1 where id = ${value}
